snippet: Legal changes and increased costs have pushed troubled companies to liquidate their assets instead of reorganizing, says Chuck Benjamin.
abstract: Interview with turnaround consultant Chuck Benjamin of Benjamin Capital Advisors, who discusses bankruptcy law for small businesses.
lead_paragraph: Legal changes and increased costs have pushed troubled companies to liquidate their assets instead of reorganizing, says Chuck Benjamin.

headline.seo: Bankruptcy Becomes Unaffordable for Small Businesses
headline.main: Adviser to Businesses Laments Changes to Bankruptcy Law
headline.print_headline: Adviser to Businesses Laments Changes To Bankruptcy Law
